events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn’t fit at all. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The customer has requested a refund due to the item not fitting, categorizing this case under Refund.
Assigning this refund request to agent Julia M. for further assistance and case handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in the original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 567890123. The jacket is brand new, still sealed in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund and send you a prepaid return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid return label, that makes things easier.
The refund process is now underway, and you will receive the credited amount within 5-7 business days after we receive the return.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your return experience.
We are closing your refund case now. Please reach out if you need any further assistance in the future.
